rooms.description: Open concept living area with Mediterranean style elements and a central focal point, promoting family gatherings.
Dining area integrated within the living space for communal meals.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with efficient workflow and Vastu-optimized placement to enhance energy flow.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony following Vastu principles for harmony and natural light.
Second bedroom featuring ample balcony space to enjoy the outdoors in accordance with Mediterranean aesthetics.
Third bedroom that provides a private balcony for relaxation and natural ventilation.
Fourth bedroom with a balcony designed to capture morning light as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Reinforced door with decorative Mediterranean detailing.
Large window opening to ensure ample natural light and ventilation.
Similar to bedroom_1's balcony window ensuring consistency in design.
Balcony window designed for optimal airflow and sunlight.
Ensuring each bedroom has a private balcony with sufficient ventilation.

rooms.description: Expanded master bedroom on the first floor with a spacious balcony that overlooks the garden area.
Guest room designed for extended family stays, ensuring comfort and privacy.
Functional study or office space that doubles as a workspace with Mediterranean aesthetic features.
A family room for leisure and gatherings, incorporating Vastu principles to enhance positive energy flow.

openings.description: Window designed for optimal daylight and ventilation in the master bedroom.
Guest room window ensuring privacy with Mediterranean design details.
Spacious balcony for the master bedroom offering outdoor space and fresh air.
